name: DIENOS
description:
DIENOS is a 2D, round based, genre defining, Dino-Shooter. See how many rounds you can last in the DIENOS arena! Collect power-ups to outlive the DIENO hoards and turn ALIVENOS into DIENOS.

Compatible with a mouse and keyboard, or XBox One controller on Mac.

This is my first game dev project I've worked on, and a short devlog series can be found on my youtube, linked in the gameplay section of this page.
